00019 class Application;
00020 
00022 class ApplicationListEntry : public Linkable<ApplicationListEntry> {
00023     public:
00025         ApplicationListEntry(Application* app) : m_app(app), m_reg_count(1) {}
00027         Application* GetApplication() const { return m_app; }
00029         BOOLEAN operator == (const ApplicationListEntry& app_list_entry) const {
00030             return (m_app == app_list_entry.m_app); 
00031         }
00033         void IncrementRegCount() {m_reg_count++;}
00035         void DecrementRegCount() {m_reg_count--;}
00037         BOOLEAN IsEmpty() {return (m_reg_count == 0);}
00038 
00039     private:
00040         Application* m_app;
00041         INT m_reg_count;
00042 };
00043 
00044 typedef ElementList<ApplicationListEntry> AppElemList;

00049     public:
00050         AppContainerRoutingTableEntry(const HashKey hash_key);
00051         virtual ~AppContainerRoutingTableEntry();
00052 
00053         ApplicationListEntry* GetFirstApplicationListEntry() const {  return (m_application_list.GetFront()); }
00054         INT GetNoOfApplications() const {  return (m_application_list.GetSize()); }
00055 
00056         void AddApplication(Application* app);
00057         void RemoveApplication(const Application* app);
